thread.title: Peter Andre admits he’s struggling with sleepless nights as ‘naughty’ newborn baby Theo keeps him and wife Emily up all night
thread.title_full: Peter Andre admits he’s struggling with sleepless nights as ‘naughty’ newborn baby Theo keeps him and wife Emily up all night

author: kpaulworika
title: Peter Andre admits he’s struggling with sleepless nights as ‘naughty’ newborn baby Theo keeps him and wife Emily up all night
text:
Peter has two children – Junior and Princess – with his ex-wife Katie Price Peter Andre and wife Emily set out to find the nation's parenting superpowers 
The crooner is also dad to Junior, 11 and nine-year-old Princess - his children from his previous marriage to Katie Price. 
Explaining their routine for the night, Pete went on: "As Emily's still breastfeeding, I can't take over during the night, so we do a deal where she goes to bed at 9pm and I have him till midnight, and then at midnight she'll do a feed. related stories IN-FLIGHT FEAR Peter Andre posts incredible video of wife Emily MacDonagh being thrown from her seat when their private jet hits turbulence 'HOW'S THE HEAD?' Holly Willoughby enjoys some cheeky cocktails on night out with Peter Andre, Phillip Schofield and Gino 'KEEP UP YOU 20-YEAR-OLDS!' Peter Andre shows he's still got a body to rival his 90s pop heyday just weeks before he turns 44 GET YOUR PETE ON Peter Andre busts a move to Missy Elliot on Lip Sync Battle as ex-girlfriend Mel B laughs at his efforts 'SCARIEST THING OF OUR LIVES' Peter Andre's 'terrified' wife Emily was told by doctors she may need a hysterectomy at 27 PETE'S PECKS Peter Andre teases fans with topless selfie in the gym 
"Then I'll try to sleep between 12am and 6am and take him from 6am until whenever, so Ems can catch up on her sleep. 
"It's a bit mad at the moment, but it's all done with love." A photo posted by Peter Andre (@peterandre) on Jan 3, 2017 at 11:17am PST Alamy 3 The couple are also parents to three-year-old Amelia 
On Theodore, who Pete has given several nicknames, from TJ, to Teddy and Friday, his tired father explained: "I guess 'TJ' reminds me of the food place, TGI Fridays. 
"I only ever call him Theodore when he's naughty, which is most nights when he doesn't sleep, ha."
